q: Mr Justice Holman, sitting in London, allowed the challenges by the councils, declaring Mr Michael Gove had unlawfully failed to consult them before imposing the cuts. In five of the cases the failure was so unfair as to amount to an abuse of power , said the judge. Subscribe to RSSMost Popular in: UK Keep up to date with Yahoo! News on Facebook.
